Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class Observable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Observable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Card, Connection, Game, Tile, View, Worker
public class Observable
extends java.lang.Object

It is the Observable class of the Observer&Observable pattern.

It has:

  • A boolean {@param changed} that indicates if the Observable object has changed
  • {@param observers}, an ArrayList of s

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected void clearChanged()
    Sets the boolean changed as false.
    void notify​(Event arg)
    Notifies the currently registered Observers about an invoked event and update them calling the update method.
    void registerObserver​(Observer o)
    Registers an Observer to the Observable object adding it to the {@param observers} ArrayList.
    void registerObservers​(java.util.List<? extends Observer> observers)
    Registers an list of Observers to the Observable object calling for each Observer the registerObserver method.
    void setChanged()
    Sets the boolean changed as true.

  • Method Details

    • registerObserver

      public void registerObserver​(Observer o)
      Registers an Observer to the Observable object adding it to the {@param observers} ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      o - the Observer which has to be added to the list

    • registerObservers

      public void registerObservers​(java.util.List<? extends Observer> observers)
      Registers an list of Observers to the Observable object calling for each Observer the registerObserver method.
      Parameters:
      observers - the Observer list that has to be added

    • notify

      public void notify​(Event arg)
      Notifies the currently registered Observers about an invoked event and update them calling the update method.
      Parameters:
      arg - the event which is invoked

    • setChanged

      public void setChanged()
      Sets the boolean changed as true.

    • clearChanged

      protected void clearChanged()
      Sets the boolean changed as false.
